description:
Adversaries may manipulate accounts to maintain access to victim systems.
Account manipulation may consist of any action that preserves adversary access to a compromised account, such as modifying credentials or permission groups
 Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Powershell LocalAccount Manipulation
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Disable\-LocalUser* OR *Enable\-LocalUser* OR *Get\-LocalUser* OR *Set\-LocalUser* OR *New\-LocalUser* OR *Rename\-LocalUser* OR *Remove\-LocalUser*)
